Such a gloomy atmosphere...\""},{ "lineNumber": 45412, "originalJapaneseLine": "街は静まりかえり、あちこちで啜り泣きが絶えない。", "translatedEnglishLine": "The town was silent, with sobbing continuing here and there." },{ "lineNumber": 45413, "originalJapaneseLine": "弔事の空気だった。", "translatedEnglishLine": "It was an atmosphere of mourning." },{ "lineNumber": 45414, "originalJapaneseLine": "「この国で一番、頼りになる人が……", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"The most reliable person in this country..." },{ "lineNumber": 45415, "originalJapaneseLine": "　あんな風に死んだんだもの」「", "translatedEnglishLine": "has died in such a way.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45416, "originalJapaneseLine": "「王とは強大無比、無謬でなくてはならぬ。", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"A king must be invincible and infallible." },{ "lineNumber": 45417, "originalJapaneseLine": "　でなければ、民は塗炭の苦しみを味わう事になる」「", "translatedEnglishLine": "Otherwise, the people will suffer in despair.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45418, "originalJapaneseLine": "「……ふん。嫌な空気だ。さっさと城に行くぞ」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"...Hmph. This is an unpleasant atmosphere. Let's hurry to the castle.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45419, "originalJapaneseLine": "「あ、ランスさん……」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"Ah, Rance-san...\""}, { "lineNumber": 45420, "originalJapaneseLine": "「おう、ウルザちゃん。", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"Oh, Ulza-chan."}, { "lineNumber": 45421, "originalJapaneseLine": "　こっちに戻ってたんだったな」", "translatedEnglishLine": "So, you were back here."}, { "lineNumber": 45422, "originalJapaneseLine": "「ああ、来たのね。さっそく作戦会議にしましょ」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"Yeah, I came. Let's start the strategy meeting right away.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45423, "originalJapaneseLine": "「おぉ……なんだ、思ったより平気そうだな」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"Oh... you seem more okay than I thought.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45424, "originalJapaneseLine": "「いつまでも泣いてるわけにはいかないもの」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"You can't keep crying forever.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45425, "originalJapaneseLine": "「………………」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"..............\""}, { "lineNumber": 45426, "originalJapaneseLine": "「……………………」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"..................\""}, { "lineNumber": 45427, "originalJapaneseLine": "「そこの、端っこで座り込んでるのは……", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"Hey, is that... Chizuruko sitting over there at the edge?\""}, { "lineNumber": 45428, "originalJapaneseLine": "　千鶴子か？」", "translatedEnglishLine": "Is that Chizuruko?\""}, { "lineNumber": 45429, "originalJapaneseLine": "「わしが来た時からその調子じゃ。", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"She's been like that since I came here."}, { "lineNumber": 45430, "originalJapaneseLine": "　しばらく使い物になるまい」", "translatedEnglishLine": "She won’t be useful for a while.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45431, "originalJapaneseLine": "「仕方ないわ。しばらくは……", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"It can't be helped. For the time being...\""}, { "lineNumber": 45432, "originalJapaneseLine": "　私が、王代理としてやってくつもり」", "translatedEnglishLine": "I intend to act as regent.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45433, "originalJapaneseLine": "「代理ではないよ、嬢ちゃん……いや、マジック王。", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"You’re not just a regent, young lady... no, Magic King."}, { "lineNumber": 45434, "originalJapaneseLine": "　前王が急死した場合、正式の引き継ぎまでは", "translatedEnglishLine": "When the previous king dies suddenly, until the formal succession,"}, { "lineNumber": 45435, "originalJapaneseLine": "　代理が王座に就くと決まっておる」", "translatedEnglishLine": "it is decided that a regent assumes the throne.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45436, "originalJapaneseLine": "「……そう」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"...I see.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45437, "originalJapaneseLine": "「一応、四天王が承認しない場合の", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"There is also a provision if the Four Heavenly Kings do not approve."}, { "lineNumber": 45438, "originalJapaneseLine": "　取り決めもあるが……」", "translatedEnglishLine": "But...\""}, { "lineNumber": 45439, "originalJapaneseLine": "「私は異存ありません」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"I have no objections.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45440, "originalJapaneseLine": "「異議無し、ですぞ」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"No objections.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45441, "originalJapaneseLine": "（……？　誰でしょう、あのおじいさん……）", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"(...? Who is that old man...)\""}, { "lineNumber": 45442, "originalJapaneseLine": "「千鶴子は……判断できない状態として。", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"Chizuruko is considered unable to make a judgment."}, { "lineNumber": 45443, "originalJapaneseLine": "　それなら、決まりね」", "translatedEnglishLine": "Then, it’s decided.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45444, "originalJapaneseLine": "「では、状況の説明をします」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"Now, I will explain the situation.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45445, "originalJapaneseLine": "千鶴子に代わり、司令部のスタッフの一人が", "translatedEnglishLine": "In place of Chizuruko, a staff member at the command center"}, { "lineNumber": 45446, "originalJapaneseLine": "ゼスの国土地図を投影させた。", "translatedEnglishLine": "projected a map of the land of Zeth."}, { "lineNumber": 45447, "originalJapaneseLine": "「まず、魔軍は東部、西部と両面で進行してきました」", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"First, the demon army advanced from both the east and west."}, { "lineNumber": 45448, "originalJapaneseLine": "「そのうち東部はガルティアという柱を失い、撤退。", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"Among them, the east lost the pillar called Galtia and retreated."}, { "lineNumber": 45449, "originalJapaneseLine": "　散発的な攻勢はありますが、対応はできています」", "translatedEnglishLine": "There are sporadic offensives, but we are able to respond.\""}, { "lineNumber": 45450, "originalJapaneseLine": "「まぐむぐ。がつがつばくむごもぐ…………ん？", "translatedEnglishLine": "\"Munch munch. Gulp gulp, nom nom... Hm?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傷つけるわけには参りません」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I must not hurt you."
"Eek, ah... ah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、参りましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, let us go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴女様には、大事な役割が待っていますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have an important role waiting for you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お嬢様の、玩具としての」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As the young lady’s plaything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あああああああああああぁぁぁぁぁぁぁッッ！！」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aaaaaaahhhhhhhhhh!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慟哭も抵抗も、なにもかもを意に介さず。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring all the wailing, resistance, and everything else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドは、今日も執事の務めを完遂した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alefgard fulfilled his duties as a butler once again today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス王国臨時首都、マーク。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mark, the temporary capital of the Zeth Kingdom.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、当座の目的地にたどり着いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others reached their temporary destination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………けっ。辛気くさい……」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Tch. Such a gloomy atmosphere..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街は静まりかえり、あちこちで啜り泣きが絶えない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The town was silent, with sobbing continuing here and there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弔事の空気だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was an atmosphere of mourning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この国で一番、頼りになる人が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The most reliable person in this country...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんな風に死んだんだもの」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has died in such a way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「王とは強大無比、無謬でなくてはならぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A king must be invincible and infallible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でなければ、民は塗炭の苦しみを味わう事になる」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Otherwise, the people will suffer in despair."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふん。嫌な空気だ。さっさと城に行くぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmph. This is an unpleasant atmosphere. Let's hurry to the castle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ランスさん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Rance-san..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、ウルザちゃん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Ulza-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちに戻ってたんだったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, you were back here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、来たのね。さっそく作戦会議にしましょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I came. Let's start the strategy meeting right away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おぉ……なんだ、思ったより平気そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... you seem more okay than I thought."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつまでも泣いてるわけにはいかないもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can't keep crying forever."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこの、端っこで座り込んでるのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, is that... Chizuruko sitting over there at the edge?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that Chizuruko?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わしが来た時からその調子じゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She's been like that since I came here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらく使い物になるまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She won’t be useful for a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仕方ないわ。しばらくは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It can't be helped. For the time being..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が、王代理としてやってくつもり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I intend to act as regent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「代理ではないよ、嬢ちゃん……いや、マジック王。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You’re not just a regent, young lady... no, Magic King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前王が急死した場合、正式の引き継ぎまでは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the previous king dies suddenly, until the formal succession,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 代理が王座に就くと決まっておる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it is decided that a regent assumes the throne."
"...I see."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一応、四天王が承認しない場合の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is also a provision if the Four Heavenly Kings do not approve.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取り決めもあるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は異存ありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have no objections."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「異議無し、ですぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No objections."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……？　誰でしょう、あのおじいさん……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "(...? Who is that old man...)"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子は……判断できない状態として。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chizuruko is considered unable to make a judgment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それなら、決まりね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, it’s decided."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、状況の説明をします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, I will explain the situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子に代わり、司令部のスタッフの一人が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In place of Chizuruko, a staff member at the command center

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの国土地図を投影させた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: projected a map of the land of Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、魔軍は東部、西部と両面で進行してきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, the demon army advanced from both the east and west.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのうち東部はガルティアという柱を失い、撤退。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Among them, the east lost the pillar called Galtia and retreated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 散発的な攻勢はありますが、対応はできています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are sporadic offensives, but we are able to respond."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まぐむぐ。がつがつばくむごもぐ…………ん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Munch munch. Gulp gulp, nom nom... Hm?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has died in such a way."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A king must be invincible and infallible.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Ulza-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちに戻ってたんだったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, you were back here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、来たのね。さっそく作戦会議にしましょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I came. Let's start the strategy meeting right away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おぉ……なんだ、思ったより平気そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... you seem more okay than I thought."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつまでも泣いてるわけにはいかないもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can't keep crying forever."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこの、端っこで座り込んでるのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, is that... Chizuruko sitting over there at the edge?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that Chizuruko?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わしが来た時からその調子じゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She's been like that since I came here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらく使い物になるまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She won’t be useful for a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仕方ないわ。しばらくは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It can't be helped. For the time being..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が、王代理としてやってくつもり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I intend to act as regent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「代理ではないよ、嬢ちゃん……いや、マジック王。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You’re not just a regent, young lady... no, Magic King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前王が急死した場合、正式の引き継ぎまでは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the previous king dies suddenly, until the formal succession,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 代理が王座に就くと決まっておる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it is decided that a regent assumes the throne."
"...I see."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一応、四天王が承認しない場合の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is also a provision if the Four Heavenly Kings do not approve.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取り決めもあるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は異存ありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have no objections."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「異議無し、ですぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No objections."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……？　誰でしょう、あのおじいさん……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "(...? Who is that old man...)"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子は……判断できない状態として。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chizuruko is considered unable to make a judgment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それなら、決まりね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, it’s decided."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、状況の説明をします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, I will explain the situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千鶴子に代わり、司令部のスタッフの一人が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In place of Chizuruko, a staff member at the command center

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの国土地図を投影させた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: projected a map of the land of Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、魔軍は東部、西部と両面で進行してきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, the demon army advanced from both the east and west.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのうち東部はガルティアという柱を失い、撤退。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Among them, the east lost the pillar called Galtia and retreated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 散発的な攻勢はありますが、対応はできています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are sporadic offensives, but we are able to respond."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まぐむぐ。がつがつばくむごもぐ…………ん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Munch munch. Gulp gulp, nom nom... Hm?"
